body.p: The Wine development release 1.3.34 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Bytecode support in JavaScript.
Support for gradients in the DIB engine.
A number of Uniscribe improvements.
Fixes for DirectDraw mode switching.
A few more MSVC runtime functions.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
